attributes.action: give the British voting public some peace of mind
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After his recall to prison we the people are asking not for full disclosure. But just some details of Jon Venables whereabouts since his release in 2001. We do not ask for his name etc just where he was living. We feel as the british voting public we deserve to know if we have been in any danger.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
